trans-unit.source: Provides access to the main buffered graphics context object for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller åtkomst till huvudsakliga buffrat grafik context-objektet för programdomänen.

trans-unit.source: The BufferedGraphicsManager class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics.
trans-unit.target: Klassen BufferedGraphicsManager kan du implementera anpassade dubbla buffring för dina bilder.

trans-unit.source: Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface.
trans-unit.target: Bilder med dubbla buffring kan minska eller eliminera flimmer som orsakas av kontrolls en bildskärm yta.

trans-unit.source: This class has one static property, <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>, which returns the main <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen har en statisk egenskap <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>, som returnerar huvudsakliga <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>för den aktuella programdomänen.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> class creates <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> instances that can be used to draw buffered graphics.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>klassen skapar <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>instanser som kan användas för att rita buffrat graphics.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> class has no public constructor and must be created by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object for an application domain using its <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>klassen finns ingen offentlig konstruktor och måste ha skapats av den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>objekt för en domän som använder dess <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>metod.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object for the current application domain from the static <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hämta den <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>objekt för den aktuella domänen programmet från statiskhet <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskap.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: For more information on double buffering, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, and <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om dubbla buffring finns [dubbla buffras Graphics](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, och <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"></xref> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"> </xref> för den aktuella domänen.

trans-unit.source: Within an application the Current property always returns the same <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object.
trans-unit.target: I ett program som aktuellt egenskapen returnerar alltid samma <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext"></xref> for the current application domain.
